insights.title: Main Trends Over Time
insights.text: Strong post-COVID recovery with total passengers approaching 2019 levels. US and European markets driving growth while Asian markets remain below pre-pandemic levels. Major turning point in 2021 as travel restrictions eased.

insights.title: Seasonal & Recurring Patterns
insights.text: US market shows strongest summer seasonality with July-August peaks. European markets more balanced year-round. Seasonality patterns have intensified post-COVID with sharper summer peaks.

insights.title: Market Share Evolution
insights.text: US dominance increasing to ~27% of foreign traffic. European markets collectively stable but individual countries shifting. Market concentrating toward established routes rather than diversifying.

insights.title: Current Change Drivers
insights.text: Strong YoY growth driven by capacity restoration and pent-up demand. US, Germany, and Poland showing momentum. European market weakness remains primary factor in slower growth periods.
